MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则既释放托管资源又释放非托管资源；为 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源并（可选）释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当释放参数为时 `true` ， `Dispose` 此方法将释放由该对象引用的托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the disposing parameter is `true`, the `Dispose` method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 此 方法可由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请确保不引用已在先前对的调用中释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding it, ensure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现此方法的详细信息，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 Dispose 和 Finalize 方法的详细信息，请参阅 [实现 dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about the Dispose and Finalize methods, see [Implementing a Dispose method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

summary.span: 在用户选择数据源之后由设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]）在设计时调用。

span.span: Called by a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] after a user selects a data source at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于在设计时用户选择数据源后需要额外处理的派生类。This method is available for derived classes that require additional processing after a user selects a data source at design time.

summary.span: 返回设计时示例数据。

summary.span: 根据 方法同时使用指定的行数返回设计时示例数据。

span.span: Returns design-time sample data based on the method and using the specified number of rows.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它包含要在设计时使用的示例数据。

span.span: An object containing sample data for use at design time.

summary.span: 检索表示在设计时将不具有可视表示形式的运行时 Web 服务器控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: Retrieves the HTML markup to represent a Web server control at design time that will have no visual representation at run time.

span.span: The HTML markup used to represent a control at design time that would otherwise have no visual representation.

span.span: The default is a rectangle that contains the type and ID of the component.
